about_the_game:
Flashing Dark

First-person horror game about a lighthouse keeper lately transferred to a new outpost. As he struggles to manage his work, he uncovers a dark and terrifying secret of the island he lives on.

The Gameplay

This game is primarily a first-person narrative walking simulator with exploration, lighthouse routine simulation, and conversation mechanics.

Key Features

  • Atmospheric environment.

  • VHS film aesthetic.

  • NPCs.

  • Unique Story.

  • Lighthouse keeper gameplay.

Plot Intro

The game begins with Jack waking up on a train. Recently he has applied for a position of lighthouse keeper on a remote island.

When Dave arrives on the island, he is immediately struck by its eerie atmosphere. The lighthouse is old and dilapidated, and the surrounding forest is dark and foreboding. Dave soon finds something on the island that moves the story forward.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains images of blood, scary scenes and dead creatures. Also the game features shooting mechanic that will be targeted at human-like monsters and some birds.
